articles.title: 'I had no electricity for six months': American families struggle with soaring energy prices - BBC
articles.description: Rising electricity costs have emerged as a key cost-of-living concern, pushing families further into debt.
articles.content:
Danielle KayeBusiness reporter
Kristy Hallowell was left without electricity at her home in Greenwood Lake, New York for half of 2025
Kristy Hallowell had just lost her job when her energy bill une… [+7350 chars]
